ygData.subject: runes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah that s true.  I recently gave a backpack full of runes to a wizard friend I know who was just starting his research.  Think I had close to 20+ common
ygData.messageBody:
>We need a rune bazaar. It wouldnt be so bad if they were ALL common, >but
>instead
>Ill get 5 of one kind, and the other one I need to combine for the >spell
>is rare
>drop seemingly.

Yeah that's true. I recently gave a backpack full of runes to a wizard
friend I know who was just starting his research. Think I had close to 20+
common runes in there. Some runes are very very common...I didn't even know
what to do with them. :) Sometimes I've seen runes randomly held by
merchants...not sure if they ever carry the rare ones though unless maybe a
PC sold it to them.

-- Lim'Dul
